info.author: Joshua Li
info.description:
himawari
==========================
|PyPI Version| |Travis Status| |License MIT|

Requests wrapper using proxies and random user-agents!

Part of the Hanami_ suite!

- sakura_
- himawari_


🌻 Usage
---------------------

Himawari is a work in progress.

- TODO implement proxies
- TODO 2.7 compat
- TODO pytests and travis
- TODO add hardcode ua string list as fallback

Just create a Himawari object, which supports the same exact API for `requests` `HEAD`, `GET` and `POST` methods. Himawari will automatically randomize your User-Agent string and manage proxy IPs for you!

.. code-block:: pycon

    >>> import requests
    >>> url = 'https://google.com'
    >>> requests.get(url).request.headers['User-Agent']
    'python-requests/2.12.5'
    >>> from himawari import Himawari
    >>> hrequests = Himawari()
    >>> hrequests.get(url).request.headers['User-Agent']
    'Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; U; PPC Mac OS X 10_5_8; ja-jp) AppleWebKit/533.20.25 (KHTML, like Gecko) Version/5.0.4 Safari/533.20.27'
    >>> hrequests.get(url).request.headers['User-Agent']
    'Opera/9.80 (Windows NT 6.1; U; en-GB) Presto/2.7.62 Version/11.00' 

🌻 Installation
---------------------

Himawari can be installed through pip!
::

    $ pip install himawari

🌻 Compatibility
---------------------

Himawari is Python 3.x compatible.

Python 2.7 is not tested as of now.


.. _Hanami: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hanami
.. _sakura: https://github.com/JoshuaRLi/sakura
.. _himawari: https://github.com/JoshuaRLi/himawari

.. |PyPI Version| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/himawari.svg
   :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/himawari

.. |Travis Status| image:: https://travis-ci.org/JoshuaRLi/himawari.svg?branch=master
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/JoshuaRLi/himawari

.. |License MIT| image:: https://img.shields.io/github/license/mashape/apistatus.svg
    :target: https://github.com/JoshuaRLi/himawari/blob/master/LICENSE
